bioghist.p: The Savannah Male and Female Academy was founded in 1865 by Rev. Alexander Scott. The Academy was located in Savannah, Ashland County, Ohio.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Savannah Academy. Materials include commencement programs, programs for banquets and entertainments, and reunion announcements and programs. The collection also includes a copy of the constitution and by-laws of the Gladstone Literary Society; programs of several other literary societies; an obituary of Rev. Alexander Scott (founder of Savannah Academy); and an 1856 copy of minutes of a meeting of the Synod of Texas.
